location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: â€˜Map showing (A) Air Routes, established and projected; (B) Islands in the Persian Gulf; (C) Boundaries of Kuwait and Trucial Area. Map II'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:331 x 700 mm, on sheet 417 x 763 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Printed at the War Office, October 1928. Geographical Section. General Staff. No. 3869.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights.Classified "Secret".Shows various air routes with established aerodromes, proposed refuelling and emergency stations. International boundaries coloured with a table of reference and an explanatory note provided at the lower right of map.Coastline and islands outlined in pencil.
